TopicTitle: Getting mods to work in Windows 8

Articles.Content:
I'm fairly well versed in all things PC, a little less with Windows 8. I have found several mods I would really like to include in the ways I cna get things done nicely (Or fail miserably!) with all the extra cool new bells & whistles to take away excuses. People have worked so hard and given of their time to make some great looking mods...I only hope there is a method I cna take advantage of them despite the Windows 8 platform.

Thank you for any assistance you can throw my way even though it's probably already been posted and replied to somewhere.

Thanks
What exactly is the problem? Have you tried installing them as described on their various download pages?
On Windows 8 here - havent seen a single mod failing due to it...
You install mods on windows 8 the same way you do on 7 or vista, or any other platform. Just put them in the right folders.
If KSP runs on Windows 8, why wouldn't the mods work?
